projectPurpose: To accelerate Apache Spark SQL query execution by providing a high-performance, native runtime built on Apache Arrow DataFusion as a drop-in replacement for Spark's default JVM-based engine.
mainFeatures: Apache Spark plugin for query acceleration
Utilizes Apache Arrow DataFusion native runtime (Rust-based)
Drop-in replacement for Spark's JVM execution engine
Supports native Parquet implementation, Spark operators, and expressions
Automatic fallback to Spark engine for unsupported features

marketPositioning: Apache Arrow DataFusion Comet is positioned as an open-source performance accelerator specifically for Apache Spark. It differentiates itself by providing a seamless, drop-in replacement for Spark's JVM execution engine with a native, high-performance runtime based on Apache Arrow DataFusion (written in Rust). While other solutions offer alternative query engines for data lakes (like Trino/Presto, Dremio) or proprietary Spark acceleration (Databricks Photon), Comet focuses on enhancing existing Spark SQL workflows within the open-source ecosystem, leveraging columnar processing for significant speedups without requiring users to abandon their Spark investment or rewrite applications.
